meanings.definition: Following one after another in order.
meanings.sent1: The consecutive days of sunshine made everyone happy.
meanings.sent2: She won three consecutive games in a row.
meanings.sent3: The consecutive slices of pizza disappeared in no time.
meanings.sent4: His consecutive wins in chess tournaments impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The consecutive colors of the rainbow painted a beautiful arc in the sky.

meanings.definition: In a consecutive manner or sequence.
meanings.sent1: She ran consecutively from one end of the field to the other.
meanings.sent2: The numbers were listed consecutively from one to ten.
meanings.sent3: The students lined up consecutively according to their heights.
meanings.sent4: The cars parked consecutively along the street.
meanings.sent5: The books on the shelf were arranged consecutively by genre.
